It is a brazen brute that barges its way
into another Pokémon’s nest and claims
it as its own. It binds its body with its
tails to make itself look bigger.
purugly.name: Purugly

chingling.description:
There is an orb inside its mouth.
When it hops, the orb bounces all
over and makes a ringing sound.
It can cry for an awfully long time.
chingling.name: Chingling

stunky.description:
It protects itself by spraying a
nose-curling, stinky fluid from its rear
to repel attackers. The stench lingers
for 24 hours.
stunky.name: Stunky

skuntank.description:
It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly
fluid from the tip of its tail. The fluid
smells worse the longer it is allowed
to fester.
skuntank.name: Skuntank

bronzor.description:
Implements shaped like it were discovered
in ancient tombs. There are researchers
who believe this Pokémon reflected like a
mirror in the distant past.
bronzor.name: Bronzor

bronzong.description:
In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as
a bringer of rain. One caused a news stir
when it was dug up at a construction site
after a 2000-year sleep.
bronzong.name: Bronzong

bonsly.description:
Bonsly prefers an arid atmosphere.
In order to adjust the level of fluids
in its body, it exudes water from its eyes.
This makes it appear to be crying.
bonsly.name: Bonsly

mimejr.description:
In an attempt to confuse its enemy,
it mimics the enemy’s movements.
Once mimicked, the foe cannot take
its eyes off this Pokémon.
mimejr.name: Mime Jr.

happiny.description:
It carries a round white rock in its
belly pouch. If it gets along well with
someone, it will sometimes give that
person the rock.
happiny.name: Happiny

chatot.description:
It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to
trick them into thinking it’s one of them.
This way they won’t attack it. It can
also learn and speak human words.
chatot.name: Chatot

spiritomb.description:
A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits.
Its constant mischief and misdeeds
resulted in it being bound to an
Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
spiritomb.name: Spiritomb

gible.description:
It nests in horizontal holes warmed by
geothermal heat. Foes who stray too
close can expect to be pounced on
and bitten.
gible.name: Gible

gabite.description:
Shiny objects are its passion. It can be
found in its cave, scarcely moving,
its gaze fixed on the jewels it’s amassed
or Carbink it has caught.
gabite.name: Gabite

garchomp.description:
When it folds up its body and extends its
wings, it looks like a jet plane. It is
covered in fine scales that reduce drag,
enabling it to fly at high speeds.
garchomp.name: Garchomp

munchlax.description:
When it finds something that looks like
it might be edible, it goes right ahead
and swallows it whole. That’s why it gets
fatter day by day.
munchlax.name: Munchlax

riolu.description:
It can discern the physical and emotional
states of people, Pokémon, and other
natural things from the shape of their
aura waves.
riolu.name: Riolu

lucario.description:
It understands human speech.
It is said that no foe can remain invisible
to Lucario, since it can detect Auras.
Even foes it could not otherwise see.
lucario.name: Lucario

hippopotas.description:
Hippopotas shuts its nostrils tight when
travelling through sand. Instead of
perspiration, it expels grains of sand
from its body.
hippopotas.name: Hippopotas

hippowdon.description:
It is surprisingly quick to anger.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a
display of fearsome strength and raises
vast quantities of sand while attacking.
hippowdon.name: Hippowdon

skorupi.description:
It grips prey with its tail claws and
injects poison. It tenaciously hangs
on until the poison takes.
It can survive a year without food.
skorupi.name: Skorupi

drapion.description:
Possessing a sturdy build, it takes
pride in its strength. It has the power
in its clawed arms to make scrap
out of a car.
drapion.name: Drapion

croagunk.description:
Croagunk rarely fights fairly. Inflating
its poison sacs, it fills the area with
an odd sound and hits flinching
opponents with a poison jab.
croagunk.name: Croagunk

toxicroak.description:
Swaying and dodging the attacks
of its foes, it weaves its flexible body
in close, then lunges out with its
poisonous claws.
toxicroak.name: Toxicroak

carnivine.description:
Hanging from branches using its
tentacles, it looks like a plant.
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling
saliva, then chomps down.
carnivine.name: Carnivine

finneon.description:
Its double tail fins propel its energetic
jumps. When it breaks the surface of the
sea, Wingull swoop down to grab it on
the fly.
finneon.name: Finneon

lumineon.description:
Lumineon swimming in the darkness
of the deep sea look like stars shining
in the night sky. It competes for food
with Lanturn.
lumineon.name: Lumineon

mantyke.description:
When it swims close to the surface
of the ocean, people aboard ships are
able to observe the pattern on its back.
It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
mantyke.name: Mantyke

snover.description:
During cold seasons, it migrates to the
mountain’s lower reaches. Seemingly
curious about people, they gather around
footsteps they find on snowy mountains.
snover.name: Snover

abomasnow.description:
It lives a quiet life on mountains that
are perpetually covered in snow. It hides
itself by whipping up blizzards.
It is also known as ”The Ice Monster.”
abomasnow.name: Abomasnow

weavile.description:
They travel in groups of four or five,
leaving signs for one another on trees
and rocks. They bring down their prey
with coordinated attacks.
weavile.name: Weavile

magnezone.description:
As it zooms through the sky, this
Pokémon seems to be receiving signals
of unknown origin, while transmitting its
own signals of unknown purpose.
magnezone.name: Magnezone

lickilicky.description:
The long tongue is always soggy with
slobber. The saliva contains a solvent
that causes numbness. Getting too close
to it will leave you soaked with drool.
lickilicky.name: Lickilicky

rhyperior.description:
It can launch a rock held in its hand
like a missile by tightening and then
expanding its muscles instantaneously.
Geodude are shot at rare times.
rhyperior.name: Rhyperior

tangrowth.description:
It ensnares prey by extending arms made
of vines. Even if one of its arms is eaten,
it’s fine. The Pokémon regenerates quickly
and will go right back to normal.
tangrowth.name: Tangrowth

electivire.description:
When it gets excited, it thumps its chest.
With every thud, thunder roars, electric
sparks shower all around and blue sparks
begin to crackle between its horns.
electivire.name: Electivire

magmortar.description:
According to what is known, a single pair
of male and female Magmortar lives in
one volcano. From its arm, it launches
fireballs hotter than 3,600ºF.
magmortar.name: Magmortar

togekiss.description:
As everyone knows, it visits peaceful
regions, bringing them gifts of kindness
and sweet blessings. It will never appear
where there is strife.
togekiss.name: Togekiss

yanmega.description:
This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable
of transporting an adult in flight. It is
adept at biting apart foes while flying
by at high speed.
yanmega.name: Yanmega

leafeon.description:
Its cellular composition is closer to
that of a plant than an animal. It uses
photosynthesis to produce its energy
supply without eating food.
leafeon.name: Leafeon

glaceon.description:
It can control its body temperature
at will. This enables it to freeze the
moisture in the atmosphere, creating
flurries of diamond dust.
glaceon.name: Glaceon

gliscor.description:
Gliscor observes prey while hanging
upside down from branches. Its flight is
soundless. When the chance presents
itself, it swoops!
gliscor.name: Gliscor

mamoswine.description:
A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice
dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to
much amazement. This Pokémon has been
around for a long, long, long time.
mamoswine.name: Mamoswine

porygonz.description:
In order to create a more advanced
Pokémon, an additional program was
installed, but apparently it contained a
defect that made it move oddly.
porygonz.name: Porygon-Z

gallade.description:
A master of courtesy and swordsmanship,
it fights using extending swords on its
elbows when trying to protect someone.
It can sense what its foe is thinking.
gallade.name: Gallade

probopass.description:
It freely controls three units called
Mini-Noses using magnetic force.
With them, it can attack its foes from
three directions.
probopass.name: Probopass

dusknoir.description:
This feared Pokémon is said to travel to
worlds unknown. Some even believe that
it takes lost spirits into its pliant body
and guides them home.
dusknoir.name: Dusknoir

froslass.description:
When it finds people or Pokémon it likes,
it freezes them and takes them to its
chilly den, where they become its
decorations.
froslass.name: Froslass

rotom.description:
Research continues on this Pokémon.
Its electric-like body can enter some
kinds of machines and take control,
in order to make mischief.
rotom.name: Rotom

uxie.description:
Known as ”The Being of Knowledge,”
according to some sources, this Pokémon
provided people with the intelligence
necessary to solve various problems.
uxie.name: Uxie

mesprit.description:
Although it slumbers at the bottom of a
lake, its spirit is said to leave its body
and flitter on the water surface. It
taught humans of sorrow, pain, and joy.
mesprit.name: Mesprit

azelf.description:
This Pokémon is said to have endowed
humans with the determination needed to
do things. It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit
and Azelf all came from the same egg.
azelf.name: Azelf

dialga.description:
A Pokémon spoken of in legend.
It completely controls the flow of time.
It uses its power to travel at will
through the past and future.
dialga.name: Dialga

palkia.description:
Palkia has the ability to distort space.
Its total control over the boundaries of
space enable it to transport itself to
faraway places and other dimensions.
palkia.name: Palkia

heatran.description:
Boiling blood, like magma, circulates
through its body. It dwells in volcanic
caves, using its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.
heatran.name: Heatran

regigigas.description:
There is an enduring legend that
states this Pokémon shaped Regirock,
Regice, and Registeel out of clay, ice,
and magma.
regigigas.name: Regigigas

giratina.description:
This Pokémon is said to live in a world
on the reverse side of ours, where common
knowledge is distorted and strange.
It was banished for its violence.
giratina.name: Giratina

cresselia.description:
Those who sleep holding one of
Cresselia’s feathers are assured of
joyful dreams. It is said to represent
the crescent moon.
cresselia.name: Cresselia

phione.description:
When the water warms, they inflate the
flotation sac on their heads and drift
languidly on the sea in packs.
It always returns to where it was born.
phione.name: Phione

manaphy.description:
Water makes up 80% of its body.
It starts its life with a wondrous power
that permits it to bond with any kind
of Pokémon.
manaphy.name: Manaphy

darkrai.description:
It chases people and Pokémon from its
territory by causing them to experience
deep, nightmarish slumbers. However,
it means no harm.
darkrai.name: Darkrai

shaymin.description:
The flowers all over its body burst into
bloom if it is lovingly hugged and senses
gratitude. The blooming of Gracideas
confers the power of flight upon it.
shaymin.name: Shaymin

arceus.description:
It is told in mythology that this Pokémon
emerged from an egg and shaped all there
is in this world, before the universe
even existed.
arceus.name: Arceus

victini.description:
This Pokémon brings victory.
It is said that Trainers with Victini
always win, regardless of the type
of encounter.
victini.name: Victini

snivy.description:
It is very intelligent and calm.
Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes
its movements swifter. When they are
not feeling well, their tails droop.
snivy.name: Snivy

servine.description:
When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be
used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps
clean. They avoid attacks by sinking into
the shadows of thick foliage.
servine.name: Servine

serperior.description:
They raise their heads to intimidate foes,
but only give it their all when fighting
powerful opponents who are not fazed
by the glare from its noble eyes.
serperior.name: Serperior

tepig.description:
It loves to eat roasted berries, but
sometimes it gets too excited and burns
them to a crisp. It blows fire through
its nose.
tepig.name: Tepig

pignite.description:
The more it eats, the more fuel it has
to make the fire in its stomach stronger.
When it is angered, the intensity of the
flame increases.
pignite.name: Pignite

emboar.description:
It is adept at using many different moves.
It can throw a fire punch by setting its
fists on fire with its fiery chin.
It cares deeply about its friends.
emboar.name: Emboar

oshawott.description:
The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just
used for battle, it can be used to break
open hard berries as well. It is made
from the same element as its claws.
oshawott.name: Oshawott

dewott.description:
Strict training and disclipine leads it
to master its flowing double-scalchop
technique. Scalchop techniques differ
from one Dewott to another.
dewott.name: Dewott

samurott.description:
One swing of the seamitars attached
to its armor can fell an opponent.
A simple glare from one of them is
enough to intimidate most enemies.
samurott.name: Samurott

patrat.description:
Extremely cautious, they take shifts to
maintain a constant watch of their nest.
Using food stored in cheek pouches,
they can keep watch for days.
patrat.name: Patrat

watchog.description:
Using luminescent matter, it makes its
eyes and body glow and stuns attacking
opponents. Keen eyesight lets them see
in the dark.
watchog.name: Watchog

lillipup.description:
It faces strong opponents with great
courage. Because it doesn’t yelp, it’s
extremely popular with Trainers who live
in apartment buildings.
lillipup.name: Lillipup

herdier.description:
Its dense black fur grows continuously.
The high cost of keeping its hard fur
properly groomed makes this a
troublesome Pokémon to train.
herdier.name: Herdier

stoutland.description:
Intelligent, good-natured, and valiant,
there could be no concern that it would
ever attack people. Some parents even
trust it to babysit.
stoutland.name: Stoutland

purrloin.description:
Their deceptively cute act is the
perfect ruse. They steal from people for
fun, but their victims can’t help but
forgive them.
purrloin.name: Purrloin

liepard.description:
Many Trainers are drawn to their
beautiful form and fur. These Pokémon
vanish and appear unexpectedly.
They run silently in the night.
liepard.name: Liepard

pansage.description:
This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest.
It’s good at finding berries and gathers
them from all over. It’s kind enough to
share them with friends.
pansage.name: Pansage

simisage.description:
Ill tempered, it attacks enemies by
swinging its barbed tail around wildly.
The leaf growing on its head is
very bitter.
simisage.name: Simisage

pansear.description:
The fire within the tuft on its head can
reach up to 600ºF. Very intelligent,
it roasts berries before eating them.
It likes to help people.
pansear.name: Pansear

simisear.description:
It loves sweets because they become
energy for the fire burning inside its
body. It scatters embers from its head
and tail to sear its opponents.
simisear.name: Simisear

panpour.description:
The water stored inside the tuft of its
head is rich in nutrients. It waters
plants using its tail, plants that
receive its water grow large.
panpour.name: Panpour

simipour.description:
It can shoot highly-pressurised water
from its tail with enough power to
break through a solid concrete wall.
It prefers places with clean water.
simipour.name: Simipour

munna.description:
This Pokémon appears before people
and Pokémon who are having nightmares
and eats those dreams. Munna always
float in the air.
munna.name: Munna

musharna.description:
The mist emanating from their foreheads
is packed with the dreams of people and
Pokémon. It changes into different colors
depending on the dream that was eaten.
musharna.name: Musharna

pidove.description:
This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for
a new order from its Trainer even though
it already has one. Flocks often gather
in parks and plazas.
pidove.name: Pidove

tranquill.description:
No matter where in the world it goes,
it knows where its nest is, so it can
always return to its Trainer’s location
regardless of the distance.
tranquill.name: Tranquill

unfezant.description:
Males have plumage on their heads.
The females’ flying abilities surpass
those of the males. They will only let
themselves feel close to their Trainers.
unfezant.name: Unfezant

blitzle.description:
Its mane shines when it discharges
electricity. They use the frequency and
rhythm of these flashes to communicate
with one another.
blitzle.name: Blitzle

zebstrika.description:
When Zebstrika run at full speed, the
sound of thunder reverberates. It is
dangerous when it’s angry as it shoots
lightning from its mane in all directions.
zebstrika.name: Zebstrika

roggenrola.description:
The hexagonal cavity is its ear.
It walks in the direction of sounds it
hears, but if the sounds cease, it panics
and topples over.
roggenrola.name: Roggenrola

boldore.description:
Its orange crystal is a mass of energy.
Just one crystal fragment would provide
enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks.
When it is healthy, its core sticks out.
boldore.name: Boldore

gigalith.description:
The blasts of energy it makes from
sunbeams have terrifying power.
However, it’s not able to fire its blasts
at night or on rainy days.
gigalith.name: Gigalith

woobat.description:
Its habitat is dark forests and caves.
Suction from its nostrils enables it
to stick to cave walls during sleep.
It leaves a heart-shaped mark behind.
woobat.name: Woobat

swoobat.description:
Anyone who comes into contact with
the ultrasonic waves emitted by a
courting male experiences a positive
mood shift.
swoobat.name: Swoobat

drilbur.description:
It can dig through the ground at a
speed of 30 mph by spinning its body.
It could give a car running aboveground
a good race.
drilbur.name: Drilbur

excadrill.description:
More than 300 feet below the surface,
they build mazelike nests. Their activity
can be destructive to subway tunnels,
but it can also help with construction.
excadrill.name: Excadrill

audino.description:
Its auditory sense is astounding.
Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell
how someone is feeling or when an egg
might hatch.
audino.name: Audino

timburr.description:
These Pokémon appear at building
sites and help out with construction.
They always carry squared logs.
As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
timburr.name: Timburr

gurdurr.description:
They strengthen their bodies by carrying
steel beams. This Pokémon is so muscular
and strongly built that even a group of
wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
gurdurr.name: Gurdurr

conkeldurr.description:
They use concrete pillars as walking
canes. Rather than rely solely on force,
they master moves that utilize the
centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
conkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr

tympole.description:
By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound
waves imperceptible to humans. It uses
the rhythm of these sounds to talk and
warns others of danger.
tympole.name: Tympole

palpitoad.description:
It lives in the water and on land.
When they vibrate the bumps on their
heads, they can make waves in water
or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
palpitoad.name: Palpitoad

seismitoad.description:
It increases the power of its punches
by vibrating the bumps on its fists.
They can also shoot paralyzing liquid
from their head bumps.
seismitoad.name: Seismitoad

throh.description:
When it tightens its belt, it becomes
stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave
their own belts. It changes belts as it
gets more powerful.
throh.name: Throh

sawk.description:
The sound of Sawk punching boulders
and trees can be heard all the way from
the mountains where they train.
Disturbing their training angers them.
sawk.name: Sawk

sewaddle.description:
It chews up leaves and sews them with
sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes,
it is a mascot for fashion designers.
sewaddle.name: Sewaddle

swadloon.description:
Forests where Swadloon live have
superb foliage because the nutrients
they make from fallen leaves nourish
the plant life.
swadloon.name: Swadloon

leavanny.description:
It keeps its eggs warm with heat from
fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to
weave warm wrappings for Sewaddle by
using the silk secreted from its mouth.
leavanny.name: Leavanny

venipede.description:
Using the feelers on its head and tail,
it picks up vibrations in the air to
determine its prey’s location and state.
It is brutally aggressive.
venipede.name: Venipede

whirlipede.description:
Storing energy for evolution, it sits.
But when attacked, it spins its body at
high speed like a wheel and then
crashes furiously into its opponent.
whirlipede.name: Whirlipede

scolipede.description:
With quick movements, it chases down
its foes, attacking relentlessly with its
horns until it prevails. Then it finishes
them off with deadly poison.
scolipede.name: Scolipede

cottonee.description:
When it finds others of its kind, they all
stick together. When enough of them
have collected, the mass resembles a
cumulonimbus cloud.
cottonee.name: Cottonee

whimsicott.description:
It rides on the wind and slips into
people’s homes. After it has turned a
room into a cotton-filled mess, it giggles
to itself and takes off.
whimsicott.name: Whimsicott

petilil.description:
By pruning the leaves on its head with
regularity, this Pokémon can be grown
into a fine plump shape. These bitter
leaves refresh those who eat them.
petilil.name: Petilil

lilligant.description:
Even veteran Trainers face a challenge
in getting its beautiful flower to bloom.
It withers away if a trainer does not
take good care of it.
lilligant.name: Lilligant

basculin.description:
Red and blue Basculin usually do not
get along, but sometimes members of
one school mingle with the other’s school.
These Pokémon are very hostile.
basculin.name: Basculin

sandile.description:
It conceals itself in the sand and
chomps down on the legs of any prey
that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite
food is Trapinch.
sandile.name: Sandile

krokorok.description:
They move in groups of a few individuals.
Thanks to the special membrane covering
its eyes, it can see its surroundings
clearly, even in the dead of night.
krokorok.name: Krokorok

krookodile.description:
Very violent Pokémon, they never allow
their prey to escape. Their jaws are so
powerful, they can crush the body of
an automobile.
krookodile.name: Krookodile

darumaka.description:
When its internal fire is burning, it
cannot calm down and it runs around.
When the fire diminishes, it pulls its
limbs into its body and falls asleep.
darumaka.name: Darumaka

darmanitan.description:
When one is injured in a fierce battle,
it transforms into a stone statue.
Then it meditates and sharpens its
mind and fights on mentally.
darmanitan.name: Darmanitan

maractus.description:
Arid regions are their habitat.
When it moves rhythmically, it makes a
sound similar to maracas, making the
surprised Pokémon flee.
maractus.name: Maractus

dwebble.description:
It makes a hole in a stone of a suitable
size. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon
remains agitated until it locates
a replacement.
dwebble.name: Dwebble

crustle.description:
Competing for territory, Crustle fight
viciously. The one whose boulder is
broken is the loser of the battle and
begins to weaken.
crustle.name: Crustle

scraggy.description:
Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it
can reduce damage by defensively
pulling its skin up to its neck.
Its skull is massively thick.
scraggy.name: Scraggy

scrafty.description:
Groups of them beat up anything that
enters their territory. The one with the
biggest crest is the group leader, and
is the most respected.
scrafty.name: Scrafty

sigilyph.description:
The guardians of an ancient city, they
always fly the same route while keeping
watch for invaders. They use their
psychic power to attack enemies.
sigilyph.name: Sigilyph

yamask.description:
These Pokémon arose from the spirits
of people interred in graves in past ages.
Each of them carries a mask that used
to be its face when it was human.
yamask.name: Yamask

cofagrigus.description:
Grave robbers who mistake them for
real coffins and get too close end up
trapped inside their bodies. Their bodies
are covered in pure gold.
cofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus

tirtouga.description:
Reputed to be the ancestor of most
turtle Pokémon, it lived in warm seas
about a hundred million years ago.
It was restored from a fossil.
tirtouga.name: Tirtouga

carracosta.description:
They can live both in the ocean and
on land. Incredible jaw strength enables
them to chew up steel beams and rocks
along with their prey.
carracosta.name: Carracosta

archen.description:
Said to be the ancestor of all bird
Pokémon, Archen itself could not actually
fly but moved by hopping from treetop
to treetop.
archen.name: Archen

archeops.description:
They are intelligent and will cooperate
to catch prey. When one Archeops
had the prey cornered, another would
swoop on it.
archeops.name: Archeops

trubbish.description:
It gorges on trash until its stomach
is full. Then it belches toxic gas.
An unlucky whiff of this gas will put
a person in the hospital.
trubbish.name: Trubbish

garbodor.description:
Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots
from its right arm. If even a little of it
gets on you, you’ll experience the full
effects of this unidentified toxin.
garbodor.name: Garbodor

zorua.description:
To protect themselves from danger, they
hide their true identities by transforming
into people and Pokémon. Apparently, it
often transforms into a silent child.
zorua.name: Zorua

zoroark.description:
Bonds between these Pokémon are very
strong. It protects the safety of its
pack by tricking its opponents. They
defend their lair with illusory scenery.
zoroark.name: Zoroark

minccino.description:
These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat.
They greet one another by rubbing each
other with their tails, which are always
kept well groomed and clean.
minccino.name: Minccino

cinccino.description:
Their white fur feels amazing to touch.
Cinccino’s body is coated in a special
oil that repels dust and helps it deflect
attacks, such as punches.
cinccino.name: Cinccino

gothita.description:
They intently observe both Trainers and
Pokémon. Apparently, Gothita are looking
at something that only they can see. Their
ribbonlike feelers increase their power.
gothita.name: Gothita

gothorita.description:
Starlight is the source of their power.
They use hypnosis to control people and
Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading them
astray are told in every corner.
gothorita.name: Gothorita

gothitelle.description:
Starry skies thousands of light-years
away are visible in the space distorted by
their intense psychic power. When it learns
its Trainer’s life span, it cries in sadness.
gothitelle.name: Gothitelle

solosis.description:
Because their bodies are enveloped
in a special liquid, they are fine in any
environment, no matter how severe. They
can use telepathy to talk with others.
solosis.name: Solosis

duosion.description:
When their brains, now divided in two,
are thinking the same thoughts,
these Pokémon exhibit their maximized
psychic power.
duosion.name: Duosion

reuniclus.description:
They use psychic power to control their
arms, which are made of a special liquid.
When Reuniclus shake hands, a network
forms between their brains.
reuniclus.name: Reuniclus

ducklett.description:
These bird Pokémon are excellent divers.
They are better at swimming than flying,
and they happily eat their favorite food,
peat moss, as they dive underwater.
ducklett.name: Ducklett

swanna.description:
Despite their elegant appearance, they
can flap their wings strongly and fly for
thousands of miles. The one in the middle
is the leader of the flock.
swanna.name: Swanna

vanillite.description:
The temperature of their breath is -58ºF.
They create snow crystals and make snow
fall in the areas around them. Vanillite is
treasured by households in warm regions.
vanillite.name: Vanillite

vanillish.description:
Vanillish has existed since the Ice Age.
It controls particles of ice, freezes its
opponents, and then shatters them with
a headbutt.
vanillish.name: Vanillish

vanilluxe.description:
Each of its two heads has a brain, and
when they are in agreement, it attacks
its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard.
It makes snow clouds inside its body.
vanilluxe.name: Vanilluxe

deerling.description:
Their coloring changes according to the
seasons and can be slightly affected by
the temperature and humidity as well.
People use it to mark the seasons.
deerling.name: Deerling

sawsbuck.description:
Some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers
of spring because the plants growing on
its horns change according to the season.
The leader possesses magnificent horns.
sawsbuck.name: Sawsbuck

emolga.description:
It glides using its cape-like membrane.
It grills berries and bug Pokémon with
electric shocks from the pouches on its
cheeks and makes a meal of them.
emolga.name: Emolga

karrablast.description:
When they feel threatened, they spit an
acidic liquid to drive attackers away.
For some reason they evolve while they
are in the same place as Shelmet.
karrablast.name: Karrablast

escavalier.description:
Wearing the shell covering they stole
from Shelmet, they defend themselves and
attack with two lances. The steel armor
protects their whole body.
escavalier.name: Escavalier

foongus.description:
It lures Pokémon in with its pattern that
looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases
its poison spores. Why it resembles a
Poké Ball is unknown.
foongus.name: Foongus

amoonguss.description:
It lures prey close by dancing and waving
its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls,
in a swaying motion, but very few Pokémon
are fooled by this.
amoonguss.name: Amoonguss

frillish.description:
If its veil-like arms stun and wrap an
opponent, that foe will be dragged
five miles below the surface to its lair,
never to return.
frillish.name: Frillish

jellicent.description:
They propel themselves by expelling
absorbed seawater from their bodies.
It’s said there’s a castle of ships
Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
jellicent.name: Jellicent

alomomola.description:
When they find a wounded Pokémon,
they embrace it and bring it to shore.
The special membrane enveloping
Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
alomomola.name: Alomomola

joltik.description:
Since they can’t generate their own
electricity, they attach themselves to
large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static
electricity, which they store in a pouch.
joltik.name: Joltik

galvantula.description:
It creates barriers from electrified silk
that stun foes. This works as a weapon as
well as a defense. While it is immobilized
by shock, they leisurely consume it.
galvantula.name: Galvantula

ferroseed.description:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock
while clinging to the ceiling of caves.
When threatened, it attacks by shooting
a barrage of spikes.
ferroseed.name: Ferroseed

ferrothorn.description:
It fights by swinging around its three
spiky feelers and shooting spikes.
A hit from these steel spikes can reduce
a boulder to rubble.
ferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn

klink.description:
Two bodies comprise a fixed pair.
The two minigears that mesh together
are predetermined. Each will rebound from
other minigears without meshing.
klink.name: Klink

klang.description:
A minigear and big gear comprise its
body. Spinning minigears are rotated
at high speed and repeatedly fired away.
It is dangerous if the gears don’t return.
klang.name: Klang

klinklang.description:
Its red core functions as an energy tank.
It is rotated at high speed for a rapid
energy charge. It fires the charged energy
through its spikes into an area.
klinklang.name: Klinklang

tynamo.description:
These Pokémon move in schools.
One alone can emit only a trickle of
electricity, so a group of them gathers
to unleash a powerful electric shock.
tynamo.name: Tynamo

eelektrik.description:
These Pokémon have a big appetite.
It wraps itself around its prey and
paralyzes it with electricity from the
round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
eelektrik.name: Eelektrik

eelektross.description:
They crawl out of the ocean using their
arms. They will attack prey on shore and
immediately drag it into the ocean, with
their sucker mouths.
eelektross.name: Eelektross

elgyem.description:
It psychically squeezes the brain of
its foe, causing unendurable headaches.
Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO
crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
elgyem.name: Elgyem

beheeyem.description:
It can manipulate an opponent’s memory.
Apparently, it communicates by flashing
its three fingers, but those patterns
haven’t been decoded.
beheeyem.name: Beheeyem

litwick.description:
While Litwick shines a light and pretends
to be a guide, it absorbs the life force of
any who follow it, which becomes the fuel
that it burns.
litwick.name: Litwick

lampent.description:
This ominous Pokémon is feared.
Through cities it wanders, searching
for the spirits of the fallen. The spirits
it absorbs fuel its baleful fire.
lampent.name: Lampent

chandelure.description:
Being consumed in Chandelure’s flame burns
up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
By waving the flames on its arms, it puts
its foes into a hypnotic trance.
chandelure.name: Chandelure

axew.description:
They mark their territory by leaving
gashes in trees with their tusks. If a
tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly,
harder and sturdier than the last.
axew.name: Axew

fraxure.description:
Their tusks can shatter rocks.
A broken tusk will not grow back,
so it diligently sharpens its tusks on
river rocks after the end of a battle.
fraxure.name: Fraxure

haxorus.description:
They are kind but can be relentless
when defending territory. Their sturdy
tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut
steel beams.
haxorus.name: Haxorus

cubchoo.description:
Its nose is always running.
Their snot is a barometer of health.
When healthy, their snot is sticky and
the power of their ice moves increases.
cubchoo.name: Cubchoo

beartic.description:
It freezes its breath to create fangs
and claws of ice to fight with.
Very able in the water, it swims around
in northern seas and catches prey.
beartic.name: Beartic

cryogonal.description:
They are born in snow clouds. When
its body temperature goes up, it turns
into steam and vanishes. When its
temperature lowers, it returns to ice.
cryogonal.name: Cryogonal

shelmet.description:
When attacked, it defends itself by
closing the lid of its shell. It evolves
when bathed in an electric-like energy
along with Karrablast.
shelmet.name: Shelmet

accelgor.description:
When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to
prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in
layers of thin membrane. It is very light
and fights with ninja-like movements.
accelgor.name: Accelgor

stunfisk.description:
It conceals itself in the mud of the
seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch
it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
It smiles when transmitting electricity.
stunfisk.name: Stunfisk

mienfoo.description:
They have mastered elegant combos.
As they concentrate, their battle moves
become swifter and more precise. What it
lacks in power, it makes up for in quantity.
mienfoo.name: Mienfoo

mienshao.description:
They use the long fur on their arms as
a whip to strike their opponents. Its arm
attacks come with such rapidity that they
cannot even be seen.
mienshao.name: Mienshao

druddigon.description:
It warms its body by absorbing sunlight
with its wings. When its body temperature
falls, it can no longer move. It uses its
sharp claws to catch prey.
druddigon.name: Druddigon

golett.description:
These Pokémon are thought to have
been created by the science of an
ancient and mysterious civilization.
It’s been active for thousands of years.
golett.name: Golett

golurk.description:
Golurk were created to protect people
and Pokémon by an ancient civilisation.
Removing the seal on its chest makes its
internal energy go out of control.
golurk.name: Golurk

pawniard.description:
Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by
sinking the blades that cover their bodies
into their prey. If battling dulls them, it
sharpens them on stones by the river.
pawniard.name: Pawniard

bisharp.description:
This pitiless Pokémon commands a group
of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility.
It battles to become the boss, but will be
driven from the group if it loses.
bisharp.name: Bisharp

bouffalant.description:
Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even
if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
Their headbutts have enough destructive
force to derail a train.
bouffalant.name: Bouffalant

rufflet.description:
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces
its prey, and then it pecks at them.
Although it also consumes berries, it’s a
carnivore at heart.
rufflet.name: Rufflet

braviary.description:
For the sake of its friends, this brave
warrior of the sky will not stop battling,
even if it is injured. One can carry a car
while flying.
braviary.name: Braviary

vullaby.description:
It can’t fly yet and must wait until its
wings have developed more. They guard
their posteriors with bones that were
gathered by Mandibuzz.
vullaby.name: Vullaby

mandibuzz.description:
They adorn themselves beautifully with
bones. This is supposedly an effort to
attract males, but no male Mandibuzz
have ever been found.
mandibuzz.name: Mandibuzz

heatmor.description:
It draws in air through its tail, transforms
it into fire, and uses it like a tongue.
They burn through Durant’s steel bodies
and consume their insides.
heatmor.name: Heatmor

durant.description:
Durant dig nests in mountains.
Individuals each play different roles in
driving Heatmor, their natural predator,
away from their colony.
durant.name: Durant

deino.description:
Lacking sight, it’s unaware of its
surroundings, so it bumps into things and
eats anything that moves. Approaching
it carelessly is dangerous.
deino.name: Deino

zweilous.description:
After it has eaten up all the food in its
territory, it moves on to another area.
Whichever head eats more than the other
gets to be the leader.
zweilous.name: Zweilous

hydreigon.description:
This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on
its six wings. The heads on their arms do
not have brains. They use all three heads
to consume and destroy everything.
hydreigon.name: Hydreigon

larvesta.description:
This Pokémon was believed to have
been born from the sun. It spews fire from
its horns and encases itself in a cocoon
of fire when it evolves.
larvesta.name: Larvesta

volcarona.description:
When volcanic ash darkened the
atmosphere, it appeared and saved Pokémon
from freezing, Volcarona’s fire provided a
replacement for the sun.
volcarona.name: Volcarona

cobalion.description:
It has a body and heart of steel. This
legendary Pokémon battled against humans
to protect Pokémon. Its personality
is calm and composed.
cobalion.name: Cobalion

terrakion.description:
Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used
its phenomenal power to destroy a castle
in its effort to protect Pokémon that had
lost their homes in a war among humans.
terrakion.name: Terrakion

virizion.description:
Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades.
Legends say this Pokémon used
whirlwind-like movements to confound
and swiftly cut its opponents.
virizion.name: Virizion

tornadus.description:
Tornadus expels massive energy from
its tail, causing severe storms.
Its power can blow entire houses away.
It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
tornadus.name: Tornadus

thundurus.description:
The spikes on its tail discharge immense
bolts of lightning. Countless charred
remains mar the landscape of places
through which Thundurus has passed.
thundurus.name: Thundurus

reshiram.description:
This Pokémon appears in legends. It
sends flames into the air from its tail,
burning up everything around it. It helps
those who want to build a world of truth.
reshiram.name: Reshiram

zekrom.description:
This legendary Pokémon can scorch the
world with lightning. It has a generator
that creates electricity in its tail. It
assists those with strong ideals.
zekrom.name: Zekrom

landorus.description:
The energy that comes pouring from its tail
increases the nutrition in the soil, making
crops grow to great size. It has been
hailed as ”The Guardian of the Fields.”
landorus.name: Landorus

kyurem.description:
This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a
hero to fill in the missing parts of its
body with truth or ideals. Its body became
frozen when its energy leaked out.
kyurem.name: Kyurem

keldeo.description:
When it is resolute, its body fills with
power and it becomes swifter. It crosses
the world, running over the surfaces of
oceans and rivers.
keldeo.name: Keldeo

meloetta.description:
The melodies sung by Meloetta have the
power to make Pokémon that hear them
happy or sad. Many famous songs have been
inspired by the tunes that Meloetta plays.
meloetta.name: Meloetta

genesect.description:
Over 300 million years ago, it was
feared as the strongest of hunters.
Team Plasma altered it and attached
a cannon to its back.
genesect.name: Genesect

chespin.description:
The quills on its head are usually soft.
When it flexes them, the points become
so hard and sharp that they can pierce
rock without any effort.
chespin.name: Chespin

quilladin.description:
They strengthen the sturdy shell covering
their bodies by running into one another.
They are very kind and won’t start fights,
but will counterattack with sharp quills.
quilladin.name: Quilladin

chesnaught.description:
It shields its allies from danger with
its own body. When it takes a defensive
posture with its fists guarding its face,
it can withstand a bomb blast.
chesnaught.name: Chesnaught

fennekin.description:
As it walks, it munches on a twig to fill
itself with energy in place of a snack.
It intimidates opponents by puffing hot
air out of its roomy ears.
fennekin.name: Fennekin

braixen.description:
Braixen has a twig stuck in its tail.
When the twig is plucked from its tail,
friction sets the twig alight. The flame
is used to send signals to its allies.
braixen.name: Braixen

delphox.description:
It gazes into the flame at the tip of its
branch to achieve a focused state, which
allows it to see into the future. It uses
psychic power to incinerate its foes.
delphox.name: Delphox

froakie.description:
It protects its skin by covering its body
in bubbles it secretes from its chest and
back. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it
keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
froakie.name: Froakie

frogadier.description:
It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with
precise control, hitting empty cans up to
a hundred feet away. Frogadier’s swiftness
is unparalleled.
frogadier.name: Frogadier

greninja.description:
It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s
grace. It toys with its enemies using swift
movements, while slicing them with throwing
stars made of compressed water.
greninja.name: Greninja

bunnelby.description:
It has ears like shovels. Digging holes
strengthens its ears so much that they
can sever thick roots effortlessly.
Bunnelby dig the whole night through.
bunnelby.name: Bunnelby

diggersby.description:
With its powerful ears it reduces dense
bedrock to rubble. It can be a big help
at construction sites. When it’s finished
digging, it lounges about lazily.
diggersby.name: Diggersby

fletchling.description:
This amiable Pokémon is easy to train.
But when battle is joined, it shows its
ferocious side. It’s merciless to
intruders that enter its territory.
fletchling.name: Fletchling

fletchindr.description:
From its beak, it expels embers that set
the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on
any bewildered Pokémon that pop out of
the grass.
fletchindr.name: Fletchindr

talonflame.description:
In the fever of an exciting battle, it
showers embers from the gaps between its
feathers and takes to the air. It finishes
its prey off with a colossal kick.
talonflame.name: Talonflame

scatterbug.description:
When under attack from bird Pokémon,
it spews a poisonous black powder that
causes paralysis on contact. Scatterbug
can live in any region or climate.
scatterbug.name: Scatterbug

spewpa.description:
It lives hidden within thicket shadows.
When predators attack, it quickly bristles
the fur covering its body in an effort to
threaten them.
spewpa.name: Spewpa

vivillon.description:
Vivillon with many different patterns are
found all over the world. These patterns
are affected by the climate of their
habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
vivillon.name: Vivillon

litleo.description:
They set off on their own from their pride
and live by themselves to become stronger.
These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick
to start a fight.
litleo.name: Litleo

pyroar.description:
The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride. The females
protect the pride’s cubs. They viciously
threaten any challenger.
pyroar.name: Pyroar

flabebe.description:
When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells
on that flower its whole life long.
It floats on the wind’s embrace with
an untroubled heart.
flabebe.name: Flabébé

floette.description:
When the flowers of a well-tended flower
bed bloom, it appears and celebrates
with an elegant dance. It draws out the
power of flowers to battle.
floette.name: Floette

florges.description:
It claims exquisite flower gardens as its
territory. In times long past, governors of
castles would invite Florges to create
gardens to embellish the castle domains.
florges.name: Florges

skiddo.description:
If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t
need to eat, because it can generate
energy from the leaves on its back.
It has a placid disposition.
skiddo.name: Skiddo

gogoat.description:
It can tell how its trainer is feeling by
subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This
empathetic sense lets them run as if one
being. They inhabit mountainous regions.
gogoat.name: Gogoat

pancham.description:
There’s no point to the leaf in its mouth,
aside from an effort to look cool. It’s
mischievous, so it’s not well suited to
inexperienced Trainers.
pancham.name: Pancham

pangoro.description:
It boasts superb physical strength.
Those who wish to become Pangoro’s
Trainer have no choice but to converse
with their fists.
pangoro.name: Pangoro

furfrou.description:
Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes
it more elegant but also increases the
swiftness of its movements. These
Pokémon were the guardians of kings.
furfrou.name: Furfrou

espurr.description:
It has enough psychic energy to blast
everything within 300 feet of itself.
The organ that emits its intense psychic
power is sheltered by its ears.
espurr.name: Espurr

meowstic.description:
The eyeball patterns on the interior of
its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the
patterns tightly covered because that
power is too immense.
meowstic.name: Meowstic

honedge.description:
If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it
wraps a blue cloth around that person’s
arm and drains that person’s life
energy completely.
honedge.name: Honedge

doublade.description:
When Honedge evolves, it divides into
two swords. The complex attack patterns
of its two swords are unstoppable, even
against those skilled at swordplay.
doublade.name: Doublade

aegislash.description:
Generations of kings were attended to
by these Pokémon, which used their
spectral power to manipulate and control
people and Pokémon.
aegislash.name: Aegislash

spritzee.description:
In the past, rather than using perfume,
royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would
waft a fragrance they liked. Its fragrance
changes depending on what it has eaten.
spritzee.name: Spritzee

aromatisse.description:
Its scent is so overpowering that,
unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy
the smell, he or she will have a hard time
walking alongside it.
aromatisse.name: Aromatisse

swirlix.description:
Because it eats nothing but sweets, its
fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.
To entangle its opponents in battle, it
extrudes sticky white threads.
swirlix.name: Swirlix

slurpuff.description:
Slurpuff can distinguish even the
faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive
sense of smell to use by helping pastry
chefs in their work.
slurpuff.name: Slurpuff

inkay.description:
It flashes the light-emitting spots on its
body, which drains its opponent’s will
to fight. It takes the opportunity to
scuttle away and hide.
inkay.name: Inkay

malamar.description:
It lures prey close with hypnotic motions,
then wraps its tentacles around it before
finishing it off with digestive fluids. It
forces others to do whatever it wants.
malamar.name: Malamar

binacle.description:
They stretch and then contract, yanking
their rocks along with them in bold hops.
They eat seaweed that washes up on
the shoreline.
binacle.name: Binacle

barbaracle.description:
Barbaracle’s legs and hands have minds
of their own, and they will move
independently. But they usually follow
the head’s orders.
barbaracle.name: Barbaracle

skrelp.description:
Camouflaged as rotten kelp, it hides
from foes while storing up power for its
evolution. They spray liquid poison on
prey that approach unawares.
skrelp.name: Skrelp

dragalge.description:
Their poison is strong enough to eat
through the hull of a tanker. Tales are
told of ships that wander into seas where
Dragalge live, never to return.
dragalge.name: Dragalge

clauncher.description:
Through controlled expulsions of internal
gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot.
At close distances, it can even shatter
large rocks.
clauncher.name: Clauncher

clawitzer.description:
By expelling water from the nozzle in the
back of its enormous claw, it can move
at a speed of 60 knots. They launch
cannonballs made of water.
clawitzer.name: Clawitzer

helioptile.description:
They make their home in deserts.
They can generate their own energy from
basking in the sun, so eating food is not
a requirement.
helioptile.name: Helioptile

heliolisk.description:
A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient
electricity to power a skyscraper. It can
stimulate its muscles with electricity,
boosting the strength in its legs.
heliolisk.name: Heliolisk

tyrunt.description:
Its immense jaws have enough destructive
force that it can chew up a car. If
something happens that it doesn’t like,
it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
tyrunt.name: Tyrunt

tyrantrum.description:
Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could
shred thick metal plates as if they were
paper, it was invincible in the ancient
world it once inhabited.
tyrantrum.name: Tyrantrum

amaura.description:
This ancient Pokémon was restored from
part of its body that had been frozen in
ice for over 100 million years. It lived in a
cold land where there were no predators.
amaura.name: Amaura

aurorus.description:
Using the diamond-shaped crystals on its
body it can instantly create a wall of ice
to block an opponent’s attack, or encase
them in ice.
aurorus.name: Aurorus

sylveon.description:
Its ribbonlike feelers give off an aura
that weakens hostility in its prey, causing
them to let down their guard. A moment
later, it pounces.
sylveon.name: Sylveon

hawlucha.description:
With its wings, it controls its position in
the air. Its proficient fighting skills
enable it to keep up with big bruisers
like Machamp and Hariyama.
hawlucha.name: Hawlucha

dedenne.description:
Its whiskers serve as antennas.
By sending and receiving electrical
waves, it can communicate with others
over vast distances.
dedenne.name: Dedenne

carbink.description:
Born from the high temperatures and
pressures deep underground, it defends
itself by firing beams from the jewel part
of its body.
carbink.name: Carbink

goomy.description:
Its source of protection is its slimy,
germ-laden mucous membrane. Anyone
who touches it will need some thorough
hand-washing.
goomy.name: Goomy

sliggoo.description:
This Pokémon’s mucous can dissolve
anything. Toothless, it sprays mucous
on its prey. Once they’re nicely dissolved,
it slurps them up.
sliggoo.name: Sliggoo

goodra.description:
It gets picked on because it’s meek.
But then, whoever teased it gets to feel
the full force of its horns and a good
swatting from its thick tail.
goodra.name: Goodra

klefki.description:
These key collectors threaten any
attackers by fiercely jingling their keys
at them. It will sneak into people’s homes
to steal their keys.
klefki.name: Klefki

phantump.description:
According to legend, medicine to cure
any illness can be made by plucking the
green leaves on its head, brewing them,
and boiling down the liquid.
phantump.name: Phantump

trevenant.description:
Through its roots, it exerts control over
other trees. A deadly curse falls upon
anyone cutting down trees in forests
where Trevenant dwell.
trevenant.name: Trevenant

pumpkaboo.description:
It is said to carry wandering spirits to
the place where they belong so they can
move on. As the sun sets, it becomes
restless and active.
pumpkaboo.name: Pumpkaboo

gourgeist.description:
Singing in eerie voices, they wander town
streets on the night of the new moon.
Anyone who hears their song will become
inflicted with a curse.
gourgeist.name: Gourgeist

bergmite.description:
It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice
that shields its body. It uses cold air to
repair any cracks with new ice. They live
in herds on snowy mountains.
bergmite.name: Bergmite

avalugg.description:
The way several Bergmite huddle on its
back make it look like an aircraft carrier
made of ice. Its cumbersome frame crushes
anything that stands in its way.
avalugg.name: Avalugg

noibat.description:
They live in pitch-black caves. Even a
robust wrestler will become dizzy and
unable to stand when exposed to its
200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
noibat.name: Noibat

noivern.description:
They fly around on moonless nights and
attack careless prey. The ultrasonic waves
it emits from its ears can reduce a large
boulder to pebbles.
noivern.name: Noivern

xerneas.description:
Legends say that when the horns on
its head shine in seven colors, it is
sharing everlasting life. It slept for a
thousand years in the form of a tree
xerneas.name: Xerneas

yveltal.description:
When its life comes to an end, its wings
and tail spread wide and glow red, and
it absorbs the life energy of every living
thing and turns into a cocoon.
yveltal.name: Yveltal

zygarde.description:
It’s said to be monitoring the ecosystem
from deep in the caves where it lives.
There are rumors that even greater power
lies hidden within its cells.
zygarde.name: Zygarde

diancie.description:
A sudden transformation of Carbink,
its pink, glimmering body is said to be
the loveliest sight in the whole world.
It creates diamonds between its hands.
diancie.name: Diancie

hoopa.description:
In its true form, it possess a huge amount
of power. When its powers are sealed away,
it is transformed into a much smaller form.
It teleports things to a secret place.
hoopa.name: Hoopa

volcanion.description:
It lets out billows of steam from the arms
on its back and disappears into the dense
fog. It’s said to live in mountains where
humans do not tread.
volcanion.name: Volcanion

rowlet.description:
This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis
to store up energy during the day, while
becoming active at night. Silently it
glides, drawing near to its target.
rowlet.name: Rowlet

dartrix.description:
A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time
preening its wings. Its preoccupation
with any dirt on its plumage can leave
it unable to battle.
dartrix.name: Dartrix

decidueye.description:
Decidueye is cool and cautious.
It fires arrow quills from its wings with
such precision, they can pierce a pebble
at distances of over a hundred yards.
decidueye.name: Decidueye

litten.description:
While grooming itself, it builds up fur
inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight
and spews fiery attacks, which change
based on how it coughs.
litten.name: Litten

torracat.description:
At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The
bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon
spits fire. With a single punch, it can bend
an iron bar right over.
torracat.name: Torracat

incineroar.description:
This Pokémon has a violent, selfish
disposition. If it’s not in the mood to
listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders
with complete nonchalance.
incineroar.name: Incineroar

popplio.description:
This Pokémon snorts body fluids from
its nose, blowing balloons to smash into
its foes. It practices diligently so it can
learn to make big bubbles.
popplio.name: Popplio

brionne.description:
It cares deeply for its companions.
When its Trainer is feeling down, it
performs a cheery dance with a sequence
of water balloons  to try and help.
brionne.name: Brionne

primarina.description:
It controls its water balloons with song.
The melody is learned from others of
its kind and is passed down from one
generation to the next.
primarina.name: Primarina

pikipek.description:
This Pokémon feeds on berries, whose
leftover seeds become the ammunition for
the attacks it fires off from its mouth.
It uses holes in trees for nesting.
pikipek.name: Pikipek

trumbeak.description:
By bending its beak, it can produce a
variety of calls and brand itself a noisy
nuisance for its neighbors. It eats
berries and stores their seeds in its beak.
trumbeak.name: Trumbeak

toucannon.description:
When it battles, within its beak, its
internal gases ignite, explosively
launching seeds with enough power to
pulverize boulders.
toucannon.name: Toucannon

yungoos.description:
With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything.
It wanders around in a never-ending
search for food. At dusk, it collapses
and falls asleep on the spot.
yungoos.name: Yungoos

gumshoos.description:
When it finds a trace of its prey, it
patiently stakes out the location...
but as it’s diurnal, it’s always snoozing
by nightfall.
gumshoos.name: Gumshoos

grubbin.description:
They often gather near places frequented
by electric Pokémon in order to avoid being
attacked by bird Pokémon, though it
normally lives underground.
grubbin.name: Grubbin

charjabug.description:
From the food it digests, it generates
electricity, and it stores this energy in
its electric sac. On camping trips, people
are grateful to have one around.
charjabug.name: Charjabug

vikavolt.description:
It concentrates electrical energy within
its large jaws and uses it to zap its foes.
It overwhelms bird Pokémon with shocking
beams of electrical energy.
vikavolt.name: Vikavolt

crabrawler.description:
While guarding its weak points with its
pincers, it looks for an opening and
unleashes punches. When it loses, it
foams at the mouth and faints.
crabrawler.name: Crabrawler

crabominable.description:
It aimed for the top but got lost and
ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced
to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved
and grew thick fur.
crabominable.name: Crabomable

oricorio.description:
Oricorio can change its body by sipping
different coloured nectar. It’s enemies’
hearts melt at the sight of its varying,
beautiful dances.
oricorio.name: Oricorio

cutiefly.description:
Myriads of Cutiefly flutter above the
heads of people who have auras resembling
those of flowers. It can identify which
flowers are about to bloom.
cutiefly.name: Cutiefly

ribombee.description:
Ribombee rolls up pollen into puffs.
It makes many different varieties, some
used as food and others used in battle.
They are sometimes sold as supplements.
ribombee.name: Ribombee

rockruff.description:
This Pokémon has lived with people since
times long ago. It can sense when its
Trainer is in the dumps and will stick
close by its Trainer’s side.
rockruff.name: Rockruff

lycanroc.description:
Well equipped with claws and fangs, it
also uses the sharp rocks in its mane
as weapons. It will attack with no regard
for its own safety.
lycanroc.name: Lycanroc

wishiwashi.description:
When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and
begin to shine. The shining light attracts
its comrades, and they stand together
against their enemies.
wishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi

mareanie.description:
It’s found crawling on beaches and
seafloors. The coral that grows on
Corsola’s head is as good as a five-star
banquet to this Pokémon.
mareanie.name: Mareanie

toxapex.description:
Those attacked by Toxapex’s poison will
suffer intense pain for three days and
three nights. Post-recovery, there will be
some aftereffects.
toxapex.name: Toxapex

mudbray.description:
The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves
enhances its grip and its powerful running
gait. Eating dirt, making mud, and playing
in the mire form its daily routine.
mudbray.name: Mudbray

mudsdale.description:
Its heavy, mud-covered kicks are its
best means of attack, and it can reduce
large trucks to scrap without breaking
a sweat.
mudsdale.name: Mudsdale

dewpider.description:
It crawls onto the land in search of food.
When it comes across enemies or potential
prey, this Pokémon smashes its
water-bubble-covered head into them.
dewpider.name: Dewpider

araquanid.description:
Despite what its appearance suggests,
it cares for others. If it finds vulnerable,
weak Pokémon, it protectively brings
them into its water bubble.
araquanid.name: Araquanid

fomantis.description:
During the day, it sleeps and soaks up
light. They give off a sweet and refreshing
scent. Cutiefly often gather near the tall
grass where Fomantis are hiding.
fomantis.name: Fomantis

lurantis.description:
It requires a lot of effort to maintain
Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some
collectors enjoy this work and treat it
as their hobby.
lurantis.name: Lurantis

morelull.description:
As it drowses the day away, it nourishes
itself by sucking from tree roots.
It wakens at the fall of night, wandering
off in search of a new tree.
morelull.name: Morelull

shiinotic.description:
Forests where Shiinotic live are
treacherous to enter at night.
People confused by its strange lights
can never find their way home again.
shiinotic.name: Shiinotic

salandit.description:
It burns its bodily fluids to create a
sweet-smelling poisonous gas. When its
enemies become disoriented from inhaling
the gas, it attacks them.
salandit.name: Salandit

salazzle.description:
For some reason, only females have
been found. It creates a reverse harem of
male Salandit to live with. Its poisonous
gas is filled with pheromones.
salazzle.name: Salazzle

stufful.description:
Despite its adorable appearance, when it
gets angry and flails about, its arms and
legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.
It’s an incredibly dangerous Pokémon.
stufful.name: Stufful

bewear.description:
This Pokémon has the habit of hugging its
companions. Many Trainers have left this
world after their spines were squashed
by its hug.
bewear.name: Bewear

bounsweet.description:
A delectable aroma pours from its body. 
Bounsweet’s sweat can be watered down
into a juice with just the right amount
of sweetness.
bounsweet.name: Bounsweet

steenee.description:
The sepals on its head developed to
protect its body. These are quite hard, so
even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this
Pokémon is totally fine.
steenee.name: Steenee

tsareena.description:
Its long, striking legs aren’t just for
show but to be used to kick with skill.
In victory, it shows off by kicking the
defeated, laughing boisterously.
tsareena.name: Tsareena

comfey.description:
It attaches flowers to its nutritious
vine. Baths prepared with the flowers
from its vine have a relaxing effect, so
this Pokémon is a hit with many people.
comfey.name: Comfey

oranguru.description:
Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty
canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare
occasions, it shows up at the beach to
match wits with Slowking.
oranguru.name: Oranguru

passimian.description:
They battle with hard berries for weapons.
They form groups of about 20 individuals.
Their techniques are passed from the boss
to the group, generation upon generation.
passimian.name: Passimian

wimpod.description:
This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately
dashes off, the flailing of its many legs
leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
It lives on beaches and seabeds.
wimpod.name: Wimpod

golisopod.description:
It battles skillfully with its six arms,
with a flashing slash of its giant sharp
claws, it cleaves seawater--or even
air--right in two.
golisopod.name: Golisopod

sandygast.description:
It takes control of anyone who puts a hand
in its mouth, to add to the accumulation
of its sand-mound body. This Pokémon
embodies the grudges of the departed.
sandygast.name: Sandygast

palossand.description:
Possessed people controlled by this
Pokémon transformed its sand mound into
a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse
grew ever stronger.
palossand.name: Palossand

pyukumuku.description:
It lives in shallow seas, such as areas
near a beach. The sticky mucous that
covers their bodies can be used to soothe
sunburned skin. How convenient!
pyukumuku.name: Pyukumuku

typenull.description:
Due to the danger that this synthetic
Pokémon may go on a rampage, it wears a
control mask to restrain its capabilities.
It has some hidden special power.
typenull.name: Type: Null

silvally.description:
Its trust in its partner awakens it.
This Pokémon is capable of changing its
type by equipping special memories, a
trait that is well displayed in battle.
silvally.name: Silvally

minior.description:
Originally making its home in the ozone
layer, it hurtles to the ground when the
shell encasing its body grows too heavy.
It was born from mutated nanoparticles.
minior.name: Minior

komala.description:
It is born asleep, and it dies asleep.
All its movements are apparently no more
than the results of it tossing and turning
in its dreams.
komala.name: Komala

turtonator.description:
The shell on its back is chemically
unstable and explodes violently if struck.
The hole in its stomach is its weak point.
It gushes fire from its nostrils.
turtonator.name: Turtonator

togedemaru.description:
The spiny fur on its back is normally
at rest. When this Pokémon becomes
agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs
into its attackers.
togedemaru.name: Togedemaru

mimikyu.description:
A lonely Pokémon, it hides its terrifying
appearance beneath an old rag so it can
get closer to people and other Pokémon.
Its actual appearance is unknown.
mimikyu.name: Mimikyu

bruxish.description:
It stuns its prey with its psychic powers
and then grinds them to mush with its
strong teeth. Even Shellder’s shell is no
match for it.
bruxish.name: Bruxish

drampa.description:
This Pokémon is friendly to people and
loves children most of all. It comes from
deep in the mountains to play with
children it likes in town.
drampa.name: Drampa

dhelmise.description:
The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves
became reborn as this Pokémon.
It maintains itself with new infusions of
seabed detritus and seaweed.
dhelmise.name: Dhelmise

jangmoo.description:
It expresses its feelings by smacking its
scales. Metallic sounds echo through the
tall mountains where Jangmo-o live. They
grow little by little battling one another.
jangmoo.name: Jangmo-o

hakamoo.description:
It sheds and regrows its scales on a
continuous basis. The scales become
harder each time they’re regrown. Its
scaly punches tear its foes to shreds.
hakamoo.name: Hakamo-o

kommoo.description:
Its rigid scales function as offense and
defense. In the past, its scales were
processed and used to make weapons
and other valuable commodities.
kommoo.name: Kommo-o

tapukoko.description:
It confuses its enemies by flying too
quickly for the eye to follow. It has a
hair-trigger temper but forgets what
made it angry an instant later.
tapukoko.name: Tapu Koko

tapulele.description:
A fragrant aroma of flowers follows it.
As it flutters about, it scatters its
strangely glowing scales. Touching them
is said to restore good health.
tapulele.name: Tapu Lele

tapubulu.description:
It causes vegetation to grow, and then
it absorbs energy from the growth.
It pulls large trees up by the roots and
swings them around at its enemies.
tapubulu.name: Tapu Bulu

tapufini.description:
People say it can create pure water that
will wash away any corruption. The dense
fog it creates brings the downfall and
destruction of its confused enemies.
tapufini.name: Tapu Fini

cosmog.description:
In ages past, it was called the child of
the stars. It’s said to be a Pokémon from
another world, but no specific details
are known.
cosmog.name: Cosmog

cosmoem.description:
Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly
warm to the touch. There’s something
accumulating around the black core
within its hard shell.
cosmoem.name: Cosmoem

solgaleo.description:
It is said to live in another world.
The intense light it radiates from the
surface of its body can make the darkest
of nights light up like midday.
solgaleo.name: Solgaleo

lunala.description:
When its third eye activates, away it flies
to another world. This Pokémon devours
light, drawing the moonless dark veil of
night over the brightness of day.
lunala.name: Lunala

nihilego.description:
One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts.
It’s unclear whether or not this Pokémon
is sentient, but sometimes it can be
observed behaving like a young girl.
nihilego.name: Nihilego

buzzwole.description:
This life-form called an Ultra Beast
appeared from another world. It shows
off its body, but whether that display
is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
buzzwole.name: Buzzwole

pheromosa.description:
One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts,
it refuses to touch anything, perhaps
because it senses some uncleanness
in this world.
pheromosa.name: Pheromosa

xurkitree.description:
One of the mysterious life-forms known
as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric
shocks emanate from its entire body,
according to witnesses.
xurkitree.name: Xurkitree

celesteela.description:
It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole.
One kind of Ultra Beast, witnesses saw
it flying across the sky by expelling gas
from its two arms.
celesteela.name: Celesteela

kartana.description:
This Ultra Beast came from the
Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack
enemies on its own, but its sharp body is
a dangerous weapon in itself.
kartana.name: Kartana

guzzlord.description:
A dangerous Ultra Beast, it has gobbled
mountains and swallowed whole buildings,
according to reports. But for some reason
its droppings have never been found.
guzzlord.name: Guzzlord

necrozma.description:
Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this
life-form, apparently asleep underground,
is thought to have come from another
world in ancient times.
necrozma.name: Necrozma

magearna.description:
This artificial Pokémon, constructed more
than 500 years ago, can understand human
speech but cannot itself speak. Its true
self is its Soul-Heart, an artificial soul.
magearna.name: Magearna

marshadow.description:
Able to conceal itself in the shadows of
others, it never appears before humans,
so its very existence is the stuff of myth.
This Pokémon is craven and cowering.
marshadow.name: Marshadow
